title: Blackletter "J"
content:
Hello all, long-time reader, first-time poster :P

I'm working on a logo for a "luxury thinktank", and am moving in the direction of a blackletter monogram with the company's initials (JC). I was hoping some of you could point me in the direction of a sexy but solid blackletter J, much like the logo for the New York Times' [T magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164500/http:/www.nytimes.com/indexes/2008/09/07/style/t/).

Thanks!
author: loki

comments.content: Have fun browsing [Dieter Steffmann's](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164500/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/index.htm) blackletter fonts, I am sure you ll find something.

Hi Kevin,

Hoyer-Fraktur, available from [Romana Hamburg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164500/http:/www.romana-hamburg.de/) (don’t let you scare away by that ‘website’)  
 [Baroque Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164500/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000005)  
 [Gotisch Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164500/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Gotisch+Bold&site=d&sample_text=J!&sample_size=388)  
F

you may like

[Albrecht Durer Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164500/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/albrecht-durer-gothic/), [Gothicus](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164500/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/aerotype/gothicus/), even Gutenbergs Textura [FF Johannes G](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164500/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-johannes-g/)

but as most blackletter majuscle combinations don't look good, you may find a better choise in

[1742 Civilite](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164500/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/glc/1742-civilite/), [1420 Gothic Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164500/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/glc/1420-gothic-script/) or something similiar

wolfgang

Perhaps you can find this internationally acclaimed book:

Judith Schalansky  
Fraktur mon Amour

zweite überarbeitete und erweiterte Auflage  
Text deutsch | englisch  
728 Seiten mit 333 kompletten Frakturzeichensätzen  
schwarz und Tagesleuchtfarbe Pink  
Format 12,45 x 20 cm  
Flexcover aus schwarzem Kunstleder mit Siebdruck und dreiseitigem Farbschnitt, zwei farbigen Lesebändchen. Mit einer CD für Mac und PC mit 150 Fraktur-Schriften zur freien privaten und eingeschränkten kommerziellen Nutzung  
ISBN 978-3-87439-748-3

It containes a CD with hundreds of fonts so you can have a look at them before buying one for commercial use.

49,80 EUR
